title: Dream of the Red Mansions - 红楼梦

sources.title: Dream of the Red Mansions - 红楼梦
sources.description: A 1944 Shanghai costume drama, B&W, Mandarin Chinese. One of many movie versions of Dream of the Red Chamber, the famous Chinese novel. An English version of the novel is also archived at http://www.archive.org/details/hungloumengbooki09603gut
